com.immortallabs.cardboard
Class CardBoardResource

java.lang.Object
  com.immortallabs.cardboard.CardBoardResource

public class CardBoardResource
extends java.lang.Object

The CardBoardResource class models an external resource contained either in the application's JAR file or in a directory relative to the working directory.

Operations:
  • The CardBoardResource class can return an image or sound to the requesting class
  • The CardBoardResource class can cache loaded images or sounds to improve performance

Version:
1.1, February 14th, 2009
Author:
Kyle Williamson, Formerly Justin C. Appler, Immortal Labs, CSC309 W09
See Also:
GameWindow, CardBoardButton, CardGraphic, SoundPlayer
Version History:
- 02/14/09 1.1 Class taken over by Kyle - 02/11/09 1.0 Initial version
